name: Mariana Mining Co
description:
Upgrade your air supply to go deeper, upgrade your light to see the minerals deep down, a better hull to survive impacts and engine upgrades to go faster!

 
Controls:
WASD to move.
Click to fire hook and collect minerals.

This game is heavily inspired by an old school game called motherload.
We adapted the concept to a submarine.
The map generation is kind of broken ATM
